ej,herzb101,P,odayh101,Balls and strikes ej,marar101,P,odayh101,Balls and strikes ej,nehfa101,P,odayh101,Balls and strikes 'Gonzalez was at bat and Nehf burned  over a few twisters on the Cuban which looked like perfectly good strikes, but O'Day decided that they were balls.  Nehf protested mildly at the first two, but when he called the third one a ball Nehf took off his cap and tossed it into the air.  Maranville threw up his cap and fell to the lawn overcome with surprise.  Herzog tossed his cap into the the air and O'Day, with one grand sweep of his arm, ordered them off the lot.  The cap tossing was contagious and even McGraw and Mathewson tossed their caps into the air.  Matty won the cap tossing contest for he threw his up over 30 feet'
